sentences.sContent: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.sCn: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.sContent: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.sCn: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

sentences.sContent: ...But there is a danger that Washington will end up micromanaging not only Detroit but also other parts of the economy...
...The danger is that although some rules need to be updated to protect consumers from harm...
...31 What is the danger facing people who live only for today...
...The danger of this approach is that tomorrow may come after all...

phrases.pCn: 紧迫危险；即刻危险；直接危险
n. 危险信号；险阻号止，危险标志
危险水平，危险程度；警戒水位
(铁路信号)示意危险，指在危险的位置上

trans.tranOther: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed
